summary: As part of our role in helping Congress to oversee its own funds, we performed certain procedures that were requested on behalf of the Secretary of the Senate. We independently counted the cash and noncash items (e.g., cashed checks) in the Senate Disbursing Office on Aug. 10. We make no overall conclusion on the results. There was a difference of $3.06 from what the office...
title: Senate Disbursing Office: Procedures Related to 2021 Cash Count
